body.name: BABY JOY Jogging Stroller, Jogger Travel System with 5-Point Safety Harness, Adjustable Canopy/Backrest/Footrest, Storage Basket & Pocket, Lightweight Baby Stroller for Newborn Toddlers (Gray)
features: Multiple Adjustments: With a multi-position adjustable canopy, this jogging stroller is available in different weathers. Moreover, the backrest can be adjusted up to 150°, gratifying the various needs of babies. In addition, there is a 3-level adjustable footrest rendering babies comfortable.

One-hand Folding Design: This jogger travel system features a one-hand folding design for great convenience. The folding jogging stroller has a small size of 34” x 24” x 11” (L x W x H) for easy carrying and storage so that you can lean it against the wall or put it in the trunk.

Smooth & Safe Wheels: With the inner suspension device, the wheels are shockproof for smooth riding on different kinds of roads. The universal front wheel can not only ride 360°, but can also be locked to go straight. And there is a one-step brake on the rear wheel to stop the jogger travel system.

Reassuring Jogging Stroller: In order to let parents know about children’s state, the jogging travel system is designed with a peek-a-boo window. Additionally, the breathable mesh and 5-point harness is for comfortable and safe sitting. And the removable snack tray serves as a bumper bar is BPA free for security.

Large Storage Space: The storage basket at the bottom can hold bottles and diapers for easy access. What’s more, you can put your phone, cup and other items in the storage pocket at the back, liberating your hands. This stroller is suitable for children up to 3 years old and has a maximum weight capacity of 33 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: My son has cerebral palsy so I needed a stroller that have various degrees of positioning. I love that the foot rest is adjustable. It’s lightweight and easy to fold and unfold by myself. A lot of special needs strollers are huge and heavy & extremely expensive so I was excited that this one is lightweight, easy to fold, fits in my trunk and meets all our needs. It’s padded and has lots of seat room. My son is very happy in it. I am grateful for this stroller and the affordable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So light but durable
reviews.reviewText: I bough this to replace the heavy duty boogallo. I had it for a while and I like it because 1 it very easy to assembly, 2 it very light, 3 it manuver smoothly. Its ideal to use it as in the city and around the neiborhood. One thing i found that not as good as other design is the incline is adjust and hold only by the two harness in the back, so it might not as strong as other design but it hold my 24lb baby just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As presented.Great easy to assemble and light.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice easy to assemble maneuvers and comfortable, kid love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The jogger concept is great and convenient and the fact that it is what airports call an umbrella type stroller/ one step fold away is perfect. But where it fails is in the quality department. The material is ok, in comparison to bugaboo or uppa. The wheels are an absolute joke, not meant for the wear and tear of a jogger stroller. The wheels are comparable to cheap plastic wheels you’d see on a fisher price toy. Another factor is that the stroller wobbles for no reason. For the price it’s decent but if I knew how cheap the wheels were I wouldn’t have bought this stroller and the issue with wobbling. I’m on the cusp of returning this I think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's an OK
reviews.reviewText: This is a cheap stroller, looks are nice but quality not the best. Does fit my small car how ever very uncomfortable for my little one. If you are traveling i eill recommend as a steoller that you can use and toss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Manual could be more helpful
reviews.reviewText: Manual wasn't super clear, I ended up finding a YouTube video for help. Also, I figured with the way the front wheel was designed that It would turn easy, but it's really stiff and you have to take very wide turns or pop a wheelie and pivot. Pros: it is very lightweight, doesn't take up much space when folded, and is perfect for my needs. The underside has a spacious basket, and it's less clunky and handles easier than the Graco stroller I had before

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's really convenient
reviews.reviewText: With this stroller, it's very easy to get around, and it's well made and very strong. It is recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, perfect cover
reviews.reviewText: My requirements when I choose the stroller is light because I'm 95 lbs , I need a stroller that I can handle with one hand when I hang out with my baby. My aunt gave me a stroller, it is good but it is big and too heavy. I cannot take it on and off the car, that's why I buy a new one. I really like the cover above the stroller because It can cover well no matter which the direction of the sunlight is
